post.content:
Amber Isles - Season 2


                                                                                                    

Amber Isle is a modded Minecraft bedrock realm, where you can choose an origin to spice your gameplay (with 12 different origins available ! And more coming in the future).

The mod contains : new ores, new armor, new tools and weapons, new blocks, new structures and new bosses ! All themed around elements and mythes. The mod is custom made by yours truly, with consistent updates to keep the realm fresh.

Here are the main rules :
No griefing of any kind, in particular the main islandNo cheats of any kindNo lag machinesStealing is allowedKilling is allowedYou can't kill each-other at spawnPvP logging isn't allowed
If you want to join us, please go in this discord : https://discord.gg/JqbfBK7gJG

I hope you have fun playing, even if it's not on our realm !

post.uploadDate: Mon Jul 01 2024 18:55:47 GMT-0600 (Mountain Daylight Saving Time)
post.content: I run a bedrock coop survival realm (mostly vanilla). The vibes are casual, clean, mature, cooperative, competent, and chill. Seasons last 3-9 months, and we started a new season on June 13th with the 1.21 release. The folks who stay active are the ones who just want a world to build on where other people are also building. It's not a hyped up kids party that burns quick and fizzles, it's a long haul build-up of farms and then megaliths. Some people will get on vc to build together, others like myself build on our own but coordinate through dc chat. We typically have a main base with shared resources that everyone contributes something to, but also people are welcome to build their own bases. DM me if this is what you're looking for, and I'll send you the dc link. :)

- more oresâ†’ more ores and corresponding tools ğŸª¨â›ï¸- the true weapons and true tools modâ†’ new weapons and tools you may know from the museums âš”ï¸- farmers delight â†’ several new crops and foods ğŸŒ½- tomemancy - magical tomes and scrolls! ğŸ“œ================================================
More key information you may be interested in:â€¢ resets are usually scarce to come by here and only happen when a majority of the community decides it's time for a new world or if Mojang decides to release an update that breaks a majority of mods.â€¢ we don't allow our staff team to use their perms for their own enrichment. This means that admins cannot take stuff out of creative mode.â€¢ what we do have on the realm is a newly set up shop system at spawn with currency,where you can earn yourself some of the most prestige items that are harder to come by.
â€¢ our rules are semi-anarchy oriented. That means:- stealing from player and killing them is allowed.- griefing is allowed in the case that the other party has done something bad to you.- any type of exploitation or hacking is forbidden.
â€¢Minimum discord account age is 2 months,to prevent people from evading bans by making a new account.â€¢ Immaturity and toxicity aren't well respected on our server either.Just cut it out. Being a poison to the server will get you muted,kicked or even banned depending of the grade of your misdeeds.
The discord link: https://discord.com/invite/SCTU7muxQ9
I hope we'll be able to greet you as a new member soon!
